Circuit Reservation Specification¶

An OSCARS circuit is decomposed roughly into three components: The Circuit Request Specification, the Circuit Schedule Specification, and the Circuit Reservation Specification. The Reservation Specification describes the Path Computation Engine (PCE) output upon completion of successful or unsuccessful pathfinding execution. This represented the response to the user from OSCARS.

The Circuit Reservation Specification is a collection of Pipes, Junctions, and Fixtures, as described by the Plumbing Specification.

  • ReservedVlanFlowE

  • ReservedPssResourceE
